programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1087
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World Ep795
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player Ep569
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep24
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Reuniting with her childhood friend Bi-zhong, a quiet romance rekindles. Meanwhile, a fiery connection sparks with architect Zhi-bin during a renovation project. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Han Ming, a prosecutor, faces a whirlwind of complications in his work and family lives: his son's clash with another student in school and his wife's intervention, as well as the strained partnerships at work. Amidst it all, a critical case challenges his sense of righteousness, and he decides to gamble everything to seek fairness and justice.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer tries to deliver seven old love letters attentioned to a Tomoko. As he falls in love with a young Japanese model also named Tomoko, he unravels their serendipitous connection.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his father's death

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions, Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons - a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Beyond The Sin
programme.desc: The only daughter of Inspector Yan is brutally murdered, and her classmate Wen is arrested. Believing the case closed, Yan leaves the police force. However, when more girls are killed after Wen's imprisonment, Yan begins to suspect the real killer is still at large and vows to find the truth.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his father's serious illness.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi's actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: To Live and Die in Mongkok
programme.desc: Fai (Nick Cheung), a legendary triad figure, was convicted and sent to prison for slaughtering a bunch of people. 30 years later, with the help of a social worker (Chan Lai Wan), Fai release from prison, the city of Mongkok has totally changed and he has almost forgotten his way back home. Disoriented and trapped in the notorious town of vices, Fai must find his way out of a life with a mother suffering from Alzheimer's disease (Paw Hee Ching), a hooker girlfriend (Mo Xiaoqi) with her mentally-challenged younger sister (Natalie Meng), and a malicious cop (Liu Kai Chi) hot on his tail.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai becomes the prime suspect in a police murder case. He takes hostages at the police station and demands to negotiate with former negotiator Jun. As the two engage in a high-stake battle of wits, their expertise in psychological manipulation leads to a tense verbal sparring match, gradually shifting their positions and mind sets.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora. After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong. Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family's expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family's reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika's mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost, when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it, a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend's grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Bao enters the palace and unexpectedly befriends Emperor Kang Xi. At the same time, he is assigned by a revolutionary group to steal the valuable "Sutra of 42 Chapters," which Emperor Kang Xi himself is also seeking. Demonstrating keen intelligence, Xiao Bao deftly navigates between opposing factions and successfully evades danger.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang's leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji, and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief's illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father's death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master's daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh's epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Hex vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma S1 Ep93
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep12
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep13
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.title: Honey Bunny As Police Patrol S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep148
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: Top Chef S21 Ep2
programme.desc: Living The High Life - Top Chef Colorado winner Joe Flamm joins Kristen for the Quickfire Challenge, tasking the chefs to create a dish featuring hops. For the Elimination Challenge, the chefs visit the historic Miller Caves.

programme.title: Sheriff Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mickey Fox, a sheriff in Edgewater and stepsister of Cal Fire's division chief Sharon Leone, must balance the demands of law enforcement with the complexities of motherhood, politics and a past that won't stay buried.

programme.title: Fire Country S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Bode Leone works alongside elite firefighters from Cal Fire and former friends, battling large-scale wildfires while navigating his complex past and personal relationships.

programme.title: Password S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The second season of Password will keep the classic format that we all know and love, while adding some new gameplay elements.

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep US S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bring That Meat Back, Girl! - Now in its second season, join the fun as three teams battle it out in the studio supermarket, testing their grocery knowledge and speed to win big cash prizes in every episode.

programme.title: Family Feud S20 Ep15
programme.desc: Hosted by Daytime Emmy Award winning host Steve Harvey, Family Feud brings all new hilarious moments and families as they compete for a chance to win up to $20,000 by guessing the most popular answers to questions posed to 100 people surveyed.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S3 Ep8
programme.desc: In Conclusion, Thanksgiving - When Adam discovers his dad's soft spot for the song Cat's in the Cradle, Beverly exploits it to get Murray to invite his grouchy dad to Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Maya - The MPU searches for a missing homeless kid and stumbles upon a child trafficking ring.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen S24 Ep5
programme.desc: A State of Confusion - Chefs combine signature ingredients in the State Fusion Challenge. During dinner service, Uconn basketball legends dine in, differences are put aside, and communication falls apart.

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Dial Margaret for Murder - While in the hospital recovering from a surgery, Todd is convinced he overheard a plot to murder someone. When Margaret realizes her important clients are interested in Todd's theories, she jumps into the role of P.I.

programme.title: Fear Thy Roommate S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Two Men And A Slaying - A man rents out a room to an old buddy, but their contrasting living habits create chaos in the house. Tiny arguments turn into petty crimes, resulting in a vicious fight that turns deadly.

programme.title: Survivor S49 Ep6
programme.desc: Survivor celebrates its 25th anniversary with new Survivor-to-bes hitting the beaches of Fiji in pursuit to outwit, outplay and outlasts for the grand prize.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor S9 Ep17
programme.desc: Grudge Match - When a family with a troubled past moves into a quiet Texas trailer park, friendly neighborly ties turn into a bitter feud, igniting jealousy, paranoia, and violence in a deadly grudge match.

programme.desc: The story continues for Sam and Jay as they run their Woodstone B&B and restaurant, navigate the ghosts' day-to-day antics, and deal with new life challenges.

programme.title: Pokmon Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: Ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, Tim, to find out what happened. Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokmon partner, wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth Detective Pikachu.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Leo - Jake (Daniel Gillies) and Tess (Dolly Lewis) investigate the shooting of a trucker when the Vice Squad shows up, demanding they cut their main suspect loose before they compromise one of Vice's investigations. When the same suspect is found dead in the interrogation room, both squads are thrown under suspicion and the station is put into lockdown as the clock starts ticking on Jake and Tess' investigation. The stakes spiral when Jake's life is put into peril and Tess is cut off when the power goes out in Sunny's (Agam Darshi) building Meanwhile, Kye (Ennis Esmer) and Sunny's relationship deepens until Sunny overhears a suspicious phone call.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep3
programme.desc: License to Thrill - After a brazen daytime robbery of a Navy Federal Credit Union, the NCIS team tracks down a group of adrenaline-seeking thieves. Meanwhile, Tennant grows suspicious of Sam Hanna's reasons for being in Hawai'i.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gray Areas - Danny and Baez investigate the death of a rising MMA fighter. Also, Eddie and Jamie race to find Badillo, whose job is on the line after he's caught smoking weed.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep14
programme.desc: The Nowhere Bride - The Task Force investigates the whereabouts of a missing newlywed. Red offers his help to a powerful cartel leader while Siya visits a connection from her mother's past.

programme.desc: Buried - As Chris (Lina Esco) and Street (Alex Russell) prepare for their final T.L.I. interviews, a new colleague works to earn Hondo's (Shemar Moore) trust during a search for a missing woman.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep17
programme.desc: Entitlement - Eddie and Badillo try to help a man whose apartment has been taken over by a squatter who also happens to be Jamie's confidential informant. Also, Danny and Baez investigate when a star student is found dead in her dormitory, Frank suspects the governor has an agenda when he comes to him with a proposal, and Erin oversteps when she tries to play matchmaker for Anthony.

programme.title: HUNTING PARTY, THE S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lowe - In rural Montana, the team hunts down Lowe, a brutal serial killer obsessed with wolves.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Consequences - When a truck driver is murdered and the drug he was transporting goes missing, the team hunts for those behind the remaining batch that is already wreaking havoc on the streets of New York. Meanwhile, Jubal is thrust closer to the case when the identified suspect is someone close to him.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fluffed - Tess (Dolly Lewis) and Sunny (Agam Darshi) explore themes of hidden identity as they investigate the murder of a realtor's assistant in the glossy mansion he was prepping to sell, only to discover that neither the realtor that the victim was working for nor the buyers he was prepping the mansion for are who they seem to be. As Tess and Sunny investigate, Tess discovers Sunny might have secrets of her own. Meanwhile, Sunny confronts Kye.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Dead On Arrival - When a Navy pilot is found murdered at a local military resort, the team goes undercover to discover a criminal enterprise hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Unburied - Jenny investigates two grisly deaths in the suburbs, complicated by an unreliable witness.

programme.title: SALT
programme.desc: Evelyn Salt (Angelina Jolie) is a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honor and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove her loyalty. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her family or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence. And with her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: WIPEOUT S9 Ep12
programme.desc: The Wipeout Bunch - With $25,000 at stake, Zombie Scare Actors, a Blended Family, and a pair of hopeful Chiropractors take on the Wipeout course, including obstacles like the all-new Shimmy Shaker and the infamous Big Balls.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep21
programme.desc: Raymond Reddington: Part 1 - Under pressure from Congressman Hudson's investigation, the Task Force must try to anticipate Reddington's next move.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep22
programme.desc: Raymond Reddington: Good Night - The future of the FBI's Reddington Task Force is decided.

programme.title: KARATE KID: LEGENDS
programme.desc: Karate Kid: Legends unites the iconic martial arts masters of one of the most beloved film franchises of all time to tell a completely new story full of action and heart. When kung fu prodigy Li Fong (Ben Wang) relocates to New York City with his mother to attend a prestigious new school, he finds solace in a new friendship with a classmate and her father. But his newfound peace is short-lived after he attracts unwanted attention from a formidable local karate champion. Driven by a desire to defend himself, Li embarks on a journey to enter the ultimate karate competition. Guided by the wisdom of his kung fu teacher, Mr. Han (Jackie Chan), and the legendary Karate Kid, Daniel LaRusso (Ralph Macchio), Li merges their unique styles to prepare for an epic martial arts showdown.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.desc: Episode 6 (Part 1) - Orry Main, a heir to a Southern plantation, and George Hazard, the son of a Pennsylvania industrialist. See how their friendship grows and discovery of the women they will love for the rest of their lives.

programme.desc: The Harder They Fall - After Peggy gives the highway salute to a rude driver while in the Rhoades' car, Steve is obsessed with the fear that the enraged driver -- a possible ex-con -- may come looking for him.

programme.desc: Part IV - A sinister force lurks menacingly behind the warm visage of Pennywise the Clown, who awakens every thirty years, altering reality to animate victims' greatest fears in Stephen King's IT.

programme.desc: Payday Pirates - Hooker is determined to find an armed robber who injured Fran and jeopardized her eyesight.

programme.desc: Halloween Marathon - Novelist Ben Mears returns to his hometown to write about a mysterious mansion that has intrigued him since childhood. But he discovers that the community is slowly becoming a village of vampires.

programme.desc: Episode 6 (Part 2) - Orry Main, a heir to a Southern plantation, and George Hazard, the son of a Pennsylvania industrialist. See how their friendship grows and discovery of the women they will love for the rest of their lives.

programme.desc: Eatin Out - When the Bundy's receive a modest inheritance check from Peg's deceased uncle, they decide to splurge and eat out at an elegant restaurant.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep12
programme.desc: My Mom, The Mon - Peggy is the hit of Mother/Daughter Career Day at Kelly's school when she instructs the girls in the art of being a housewife, including demonstrations of wallet pilfering and mastering the TV remote control.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Can't Dance, Don't Ask Me - When Kelly is faced with a choice of getting kicked out of school or joining the tap dance club, she swallows her pride, buckles on her tap shoes and performs some dirty dancing that leaves the audience sweating in their seats.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep14
programme.desc: A Three Job, No Income Family - When Peggy gets a job selling cosmetics and brings home more money than Al, he gets a second job to regain his self-respect, but still finds himself losing the breadwinning game.

programme.desc: Tough Shalt Not - Sam jumps into the life of a beleaguered rabbi who is desperately trying to reunite his torn family.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Warrior Princess - Someone is trying to kill Princess Diana, so Xena has to protect her. Since Xena and Diana are physically identical, they exchange their roles so Xena can discover who's the killer

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mortal Beloved - Xena's dead love Marcus appears on Earth to tell her the underworld has been taken over by mad Atyminius, who has confined the good souls to Tartarus and given evil the run of the Elysian Fields.

programme.desc: Part 1 - Novelist Ben Mears returns to his hometown to write about a mysterious mansion that has intrigued him since childhood. But he discovers that the community is slowly becoming a village of vampires.

programme.title: Salem's Lot Ep03

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep55
programme.desc: Howl - Suman's body deteriorates and Allen succeeds in getting Suman's Innocence out of his body. However, Suman's body is alive but his mind is dead.

programme.desc: Death Of The Nameless Story - 400 years ago, Tinasha destroyed Tuldarr in a single night. Oscar rewrote history, erasing the Witch of the Azure Moon.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Witch's Return - Morihito Otogi is a teenager with ogre strength. His childhood friend, Nico, is coming home after completing her witch training! Following an old pact, they begin living together. Nico's very excited to be reunited with Morihito and her heart won't stop pounding. Along with the clumsy Nico bringing in a whirlwind of inescapable, fantastical magical troubles, can Morihito protect Nico from a dire prophecy? Nico and Morihito's magical comedy begins!

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Giant Rookie / Lets Go To A Diner / The Flying Classroom - Nico and Morihito's living situation filled with grim prospects begins, but for Morihito, an even greater challenge awaits him. That's right, Morihito and Nico both enrolled in Asunaro Private High School. They're both in the same class, but Morihito pushes Nico to hide the fact that she's a witch. But when Nico tries to sneakily use magic to save Morihito, she may have accidentally spilled all the beans!

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep5
programme.desc: With sweet safety off the table, the top six bakers must create a scrumptious illusion by mastering a gravity-defying cake. In the elimination challenge, the home bakers create desserts using a flavor of tea.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep6
programme.desc: In the Technique Test, the five remaining home bakers do the chocolate truffle shuffle and create a picture-perfect display made entirely out of chocolate. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers get botanical.

programme.title: The Irrational S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Alec and the team take on a kidnapping case at the request of a desperate father. Their investigation is hampered by a complicated family dynamic that slowly reveals everyone's hidden motivations.

programme.title: The Irrational S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Alec and the team head to Las Vegas to help Camille, a former colleague turned expert poker player who's been lured into danger. They must take some risks to solve a gambling mystery before Camille gets hurt. Marisa makes a significant discovery.

programme.title: The Irrational S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Alec agrees to testify as an expert witness in a wrongful death trial for a friend of Kylie's. As he faces an old nemesis, he discovers competing emotions around an accidental shooting. Marisa reaches a decision about the bombing investigation.

programme.title: The Irrational S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Alec's first date with Rose turns into a 24-hour excursion when they find themselves taking on an investigation involving a forged masterpiece. Marisa and Kylie attempt to revive their friendship, which has faltered since Alec and Marisa's divorce.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: Mauldin (Thora Birch) is a strong-willed but misguided young woman who encourages her millions of blog followers to apply her scientific formula to all relationships in order to prevent heartache.

programme.title: Framed By My Sister
programme.desc: The families of twin sisters are infiltrated by a mysterious triplet, who was separated from them at birth by their adopted mother. She frames one of the twins for murdering the other's husband and then assumes the identity of the widow. Can she succeed?

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.desc: After being tricked into a compromising situation, high school senior Hannah Fletcher thinks she can stop her cousin Madison's blackmail by taking her college entrance exam for her. But nothing is enough for Madison, and her plans soon become deadly

programme.desc: When Celeste Beard's multimillionaire husband was killed by her delusional and disturbed friend Tracey, Celeste was certain she would never be blamed. But Celeste's twin daughters discovered the truth and works to bring her to justice.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her familys estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.desc: Elise faces darkest entity yet, helping teen contact late mom, in chilling prequel to Lambert family haunting.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, and Wichita embark on a journey to find Little Rock, while dealing with a horde of super-zombies migrating from city to city and destroying everything in their wake.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Selene decides to find a way to end the conflict between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction, who are trying to hunt her down. She tries everything in her hand to save humanity.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: U-571

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.desc: Fresh Water - The remarkable animal drama in fresh water, the lifeblood of our planet.

programme.desc: Series 1 - A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Having been fearful of hippos since a young boy, Steve Backshall sets out to discover why hippos are considered the most dangerous animals in Africa, and if their aggressive reputation is misunderstood.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep9
programme.desc: A single sturgeon can produce a bowl of sustainable caviar worth $12,000; a shepherd's pie puts a modern twist on Mom's classic recipe; a family business rolls out nine million risotto balls every year; and discover the secret to making decadent ice wine truffles.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep10
programme.desc: See how the cheese met the peanut butter in this legendary sandwich snack; get the scoop on two-toned frozen fruit bars from Florida; 1.5 million blueberry dumplings are produced in just one shift; and it takes a mountain of super-food to make tantalizing kale chips.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The lion pride males are injured and the mothers with cubs are left vulnerable after an attack; Xudum, the female leopard, takes risks to find a mate.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Cortina - The Dolomites & WW1 - This is an incredibly challenging hut-to-hut European alpine adventure, but what makes this trip unique is the frequent use of the 'via ferrata or 'exposed trails with secure cables'.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Melt-in-your-mouth chocolate mints are lovingly finished by hand. In a unique antipasto, the star ingredient goes from field to jar all on the same day; Aussie-style soft licorice owes its success to a blunder Down Under; and find out the secret to making perfectly seasoned plantain chips.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Peanut butter cups feature an amazing history and a one-of-a-kind butterscotch coating; starting with giant slabs of butter, three million Sara Lee pound cakes are produced every year; three types of citrus go from tree to jar at this Florida orchard; and a butter chicken cooking sauce is made at a university research facility.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Family - One family, 37 faces: from the Arctic wolf to the talkative dhole, the tiny fennec fox to the long-legged maned wolf, this is the definitive celebration of dogs in the wild.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Simon travels from Chile's Atacama Desert and follows the Andes mountains to Patagonia before ending up in the most southerly permanently inhabited region on earth, Tierra del Fuego.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep6
programme.desc: What's Up From Down - In Kavik, Sue looks for rabbits before the sun sets for the long dark winter. Johnny, traps with a rabbit hide. Avery and his brother Gage, experience a white-out.

programme.desc: Atmosphere - The almost implausible story of how our life-sustaining atmosphere came to exist.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europe's largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts' reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocodile Capers - Strap in for Dr. Amanda's risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who's headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Surviving the Flood - Track Molelo's pride, who are exhausted by cub care when the winter floods arrive. Check on the cheetah cubs, who make a difficult decision, and witness a scary encounter that makes leopard mum Sephiri choose between her old family and her new cubs.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Growing Up Gibbon - Hoolock Gibbons are specialists of the Jungle. Living in close knit families, youngsters spend years learning the skills to survive. Meet Samar as he forages for food, avoids predators, and masters the acrobatics required for a life in the trees.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europe's largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts' reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa's east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep1

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroo's deadly boxing moves and the redback spider's precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Riddles of the Dead - The Black Rhino is the most endangered species in the world and when they start dying in rapid success, Ol Pejeta brings their expertise to help figure out what's killing thembefore its too late.

programme.title: Untamed Valley S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend - Battle the beachmaster, a giant hippo who rules a two-mile-long section of the river's biggest bend. Watch his fellow creatures evade the Nsefu pride of lions, who are looking for an easy meal, unless a Nile crocodile decides to steal their dinner.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tidal Forest of Africa - We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari - Take a look at one of Africa's most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Urban Penguins - An unusual colony of African penguins have learned to live with their human neighbours on the southwestern tip of Africa, but their tenacity is tested by golf courses, highways, pets, and a sea of curious humans who view them as a tourist attraction.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Precious Waters - Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.

programme.title: Secret Life Of The Koala S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Koala Country - Despite being one of Australia's best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Secret Life Of The Koala S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Great Parks Of Africa S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hluhluwe-Imfolozi - In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent - Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park's establishment gave rhinos a lifeline - breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Rhythm of the Bay - The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America's largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere. The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Yukon Wild - The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwich'in, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter - It's November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Growing Up Gibbon - Hoolock Gibbons are specialists of the Jungle. Living in close knit families, youngsters spend years learning the skills to survive. Meet Samar as he forages for food, avoids predators, and masters the acrobatics required for a life in the trees.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Summer Cubs - Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Surviving the Flood - Track Molelo's pride, who are exhausted by cub care when the winter floods arrive. Check on the cheetah cubs, who make a difficult decision, and witness a scary encounter that makes leopard mum Sephiri choose between her old family and her new cubs.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba pride's nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as he's saved from snapping jaws and cements the family's future.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Summer Cubs - Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba pride's nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Arc of Baringo - Ol Pejeta must help move eight giraffes to a newly opened wildlife area on an island several hundred kilometers away. How do you move the tallest animals on the planet?

programme.title: Untamed Valley S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ebony Plain - Leave the river behind and stalk the valley's grasslands. Explore territory that's home to a troop of baboons, a family of warthogs, and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Check in with a nesting family of storks and fend off wild dogs at night.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the Peaks - The air is thin and cold, trees can't even live here -? it's not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We'll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs can't grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure, communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Bisected by the Mekong's mighty waters, Cambodia is defined by its relationship to this great river. See why the country is a biodiversity hot spot and explore the secret refuges of animal populations that survive in its untouched natural habitats.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - The Mekong is Cambodia's lifeline, especially during the scorching dry season, when precious moisture is hard to come by. Learn how all manner of flying creatures, from birds to bats, manage resources until the rainy season brings sweet relief.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekong's journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnam's crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Mekong S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Vietnam: the Journey's End - The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europe's largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts' reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the world's 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are nature's best lumberjacks, explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills, and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia - Scan the Australian skies, which regularly deliver some of the world's most volatile weather. Await cooling monsoon rains, watch lightning ignite vast wildfires, and marvel at the ingenious adaptations that help wildlife deal with these extremes.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: Night of the Living Carrots S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Carrots - On Halloween, a mutant alien pumpkin explodes in a carrot garden and zombie carrots rise up, bite the townspeople, and take over their minds. B.O.B., Dr. Cockroach and The Missing Link join forces to take on the zombie carrots.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Run For The Border - When King Julien hosts the ultimate party, his Boom Box breaks, the kingdom becomes too crowded and he builds a giant wall to surround the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called Julien-Vision but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat's sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don't go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep63
programme.desc: Untitled Templeton Project - Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town's faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep64
programme.desc: Puppy Love - Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.
