programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms' excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Aquadons - To escape big trouble, the Dinotrux quickly put together a raft and hit the sea. But there might be danger lurking in the water, too.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep50
programme.desc: The Return - The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Worst In Show,Belle Of The Gumball - Whiplash finds a perfect poodle moth to enter to compete in the show, Chet attends a gala with a rich snail after he's named "Handsomest Snail Alive".

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Hawaii Five No,Story Of J.J.E.F.F - The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation, Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse's New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep39
programme.desc: The Case of the Pirate's Treasure - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep51
programme.desc: PC Roary - Roary helps PC Pete keep the track safe on a snowy day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Winter Breeze - Breeze is visiting the track. The beach is boring in the winter as nobody comes to visit. She tries her best to help everyone get ready for the winter festival but doesn't seem to be good at anything

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Why Woodpecker Pecks - You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all. Then one very dark night in Tinga Tinga, the Moon and the Stars disappear! The animals summon the birds to tell Lion but Woodpecker can't pass the message on! Distraught, Woodpecker flies up to the skies but where are the stars?! And where is the Moon?! In desperation Woodpecker pecks at the dark sky and a star comes back, then another, then another! Everyone is delighted, no beast more than Woodpecker who now has her very own special sound pecking.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people's prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi's prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Yi's LiLi-est Fan - While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who's positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew's pursuits. When Everest doesn't return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi's intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep13

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter , Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19

It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.desc: Pups and the Werepuppy! / Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor - Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin, and the PAW Patrol needs to solve the mystery of the Werepuppy! It's Cowboy Day at the Wingnuts Dude Ranch. Mayor Goodway tries to brave the hazards of the ranch all while sleepwalking!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1004
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep116
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Haunted House / The Crew Builds A Bat House - When Mayor Greatway asks the pups to fix up a house for her Halloween Party, they find out it might be haunted! When Rubble & Crew discover some batty visitors at their Fall Festival, the pups must work fast to build the bats a new, safe home.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Troll Jelly / Catch That Kitty - Dora and Boots help the Grumples make troll jelly before the Grumpy Old Troll's snack time. / Dora and Boots have to recover El Gatito Magico and put it in its special place so all the friends stop acting like a cat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween / Wavey Jones' Locker - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish! Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep85
programme.desc: I Spy - The voice trumpet leads a game of 'I Spy' where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: Robot - Dee encourages a friend to say 'robot' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Journey to Musical Mountain - On today's poptastic adventure, Plom finds a very special singing bug. But when the bug disappears,can the friends create their own songs so the bugs can sing along?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubbles, bubbles, all over OKIDO! Zam invents a super-strong bubble machine, but things go a bit wrong and Zim finds himself in a spot of bother.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Cricket - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Slide - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Calm Down - Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Master of Puppets - At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Sleepytime - Inside Bingo's dream, Bingo and Floppy have an intergalactic adventure, while the rest of her sleep-deprived family try to navigate Bingo's non-stop night-time bedhopping.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mission: Stormy Mountain - Dan and Jamie ride the chair lift to the top of the mountain to warn some hikers that the resort is closing because of a storm. Can they get everyone off the mountain safely in time?

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sea Lion and Capybara - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a noisy sea lion and see his swimming skills. They also give some capybara breakfast and find they have a surprising skill in common with the sea lion.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep23
programme.desc: Boom Family Reunion - In this episode Seaweed is missing his family, so Sandy organises a 'Boom' video call with his (and Captain Captain's) unusual relatives.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep39
programme.desc: The Getting On Badge - When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Dressing Up Badge - Duggee is wrapping a present because it is Enid's birthday. But the squirrels didn't get her anything!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's Grimbots steal the pole's marker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - The Go Jetters help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across Europe.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep8
programme.desc: James the Super Engine - When James hears the children of Sodor talking about their latest comic book superhero, he imagines that he too can become a hero.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Planetarium Aquarium - Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Art Park - Fifi and Fred help Stanley clear the park after a storm so it's ready for an Art Competition. The children use the recycled rubbish they found to make their pieces.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Mayor Stan - Myrtle declares Stanley Mayor for a day. He soon finds there is a dance class and new barn to open with lots of ribbon cutting, and he even fits in making a Bowling alley.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep1
programme.desc: It's time to post a picture - JoJo has drawn a picture to show Great Gran Gran over a video call, but just as she's about to show it, the internet goes down!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Perfect - For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Organising Badge - Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out and crashes into a tower that Betty has built.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cucumber - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Cucumber performing Cool Under Pressure while trying to not let any obstacle ruin her calm routine.

programme.desc: Pumpkin - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Pumpkin demonstrating incredible strength and attempting to break a Roots & Fruits record.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Dragon Boat Beats - The Supermarket is frozen over and Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Tomato practice for the boat race by using chopsticks for oars, but it doesn't go well as they're out of sync with each other.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep40
programme.desc: How to be a Supertato - Supertato shows the Grape Kids a Supertato training film, but Evil Pea sneaks in to take over Tato Tower. The Grape Kids use the rug launcher to eject Evil Pea out of the tower.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.
